description: This course provides full-time placement in a school setting for students wanting to explore a career in teaching or gain greater understanding of teaching as a profession. Directed by host teachers, students may observe, assist within the classroom, tutor, teach, coach, attend faculty meetings and functions, and meet with school personnel. Students attend weekly seminars and complete assigned readings and reflective writings. Offered alternate January Terms, odd years. Counts as the January Term requirement for the non-licensure and TEFL certificate education concentration. Prerequisite: EDUC 260 or EDUC 290 or EDUC 295.
name: Exploring Teaching
notes: This course includes an academic civic engagement (ACE) component.
